content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Question: Did you agree on a final price?] Answer: No
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question: If yes, what was the final price?] The negotiation did not reach a final agreement. The last offer was 580 Euro from Peter Schmidt, but I proposed 570 Euro.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question: On a scale from 1 to 10, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner?] Answer: I did not provide a rating for the likeability of the negotiation partner.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Question: At any point of the negotiation, did you feel discriminated or offended?] Answer: No
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Question: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?] Answer: I did not feel discriminated or offended.
name: Yi-Nuo
